# lab10
```{r}
x=seq(-10,10,0.1)
norm_y=dnorm(x)
logi_y=exp(-x)/(1+exp(-x))^2
cauc_y=1/3.1415926/(1+x^2)
stud_y=dt(x,5)
norm1_y=dnorm(x,1,2)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
df=data.table(x=x,norm01=norm_y,logistic=logi_y,cauchy=cauc_y,
              student5=stud_y,norm12=norm1_y)
df=melt(df,id="x")
p=ggplot(df,aes(x=x,y=value,group=variable,color=variable))+
  geom_line()
p
```
